prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that shines like a star and has a cosmic theme.
Design a psychic Pokemon that embodies the power of the universe with swirling patterns.
Show me a Pokemon that represents transformation and has a celestial appearance.
Imagine a Pokemon with a golden exterior and a deep space core, radiating energy.
Generate an otherworldly Pokemon with a unique shape and mesmerizing colors.
Make a legendary Pokemon that looks like it came from a distant galaxy.
Give me a stunning Pokemon that combines elements of space and ancient artifacts.
